result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

1:52 PM Defendant Thai Nmi Vang appeared by video.  Attorney Casey James Hoff appeared by video for Thai Nmi Vang.  Attorney Joel N Urmanski in court for State of Wisconsin. Zongchen Moua appeared by video - sworn.
Victim rights complied with. Defense provided investigative docs to the State, all discovery complete. State needs to review docs provided by Def. Defense and State to confer within 30 days re: potential resolution. Def. to provide written report by 12/12/2022. Atty Hoff to prepare Order.

ADDRESS INFO for Thai Nmi Vang
Current: 850 E. Drexel Avenue, Oak Creek, WI 53154 United States  (Effective: 05-02-2022)
Prior: 3721 Bismarck Circle, Sheboygan, WI 53081
from Atty Hoff updated client's address

8:34 AM Defendant Thai Nmi Vang by zoom means with attorney Casey James Hoff in person.  Defendant Thai Nmi Vang in custody.  Joel N Urmanski appeared for the Wisconsin, State of in person.  Follow up bond hearing from yesterday's adjourned bond hearing. State is in compliance w/victim's rights. Defense motions to modify bond to a signature bond or a lower cash bond not to exceed $2,500. Court does agree $100,000 is excessive but feels cash is necessary. Court amends cash bond to $15,000 w/additional conditions. Court clearly states defendant can SOLELY come to Sheboygan County for court appearances and to meet w/Atty Hoff at his office. No other stops in Sheboygan County on his way to those places or leaving them.

UNSIGNED-NOT TO BE RELEASED W/O GPS DEVICE
CASH BOND AMENDED DOWN
Standard Conditions
Additional Conditions:
  No contact directly or indirectly with the party/parties named in the bail bond, no contact at their residence/property.
  Not possess any dangerous weapons, including knives.
  Not to consume alcoholic beverages, illegal drugs or possess drug paraphernalia.
  Not possess controlled substances except for those medications specifically prescribed for him/her by a health care professional.
  Not to possess needles/syringes except with a valid prescription.
  Not to be on the premises of any tavern or business whose sole purpose is the sale of alcoholic beverages.
  Comply with day reporting requirements-GPS-address restrictions, deft must reside in Oak Creek, WI and NOT allowed in Sheboygan County except for the sole purpose of court hearings and to meet w/atty at his office.
  Defendant may not return to work in Sheboygan County.

1:29 PM Defendant Thai Nmi Vang by zoom means with attorney Casey James Hoff.  Defendant Thai Nmi Vang in custody.  Paul Christopher Dedinsky appeared for the Wisconsin, State of by zoom means.  Interpreter Zongcheng Moua by zoom means-sworn. Defense request to reduce cash bond. State objects to bond modification. Court taking motion under advisement, needs additional time to review motion.  JA to reschedule prior to May 2, 2022.

01:43 PM Defendant Thai Nmi Vang by zoom means with attorney Casey James Hoff.  Defendant Thai Nmi Vang in custody.  Mark s Williams appeared for the Wisconsin, State of.
Defendant waives right to in person appearance. State is in compliance w/950 and Marsy's Law. State filed information, defense received and waived reading. Count 2 was dismissed 
on 3/16/22 and the court dismisses count 3 (forfeiture) w/o prejudice. Court finds probable cause for count 1. NG plea entered. Defense requests a bail/bond hearing be set. Court 
instructs defense to file a motion to modify bail and contact JA for a date.
Status conference on June 6, 2022 at 08:00 am.
